products.title: Vibe Purple
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vibe Purple Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 1690mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
